reason: The Frenkel bipartite formula FR-bip cited here is WRONG. It uses a single-term kernel [gamma(1+d_A*gamma)]^{-1}. Test case rho=|0><0|, sigma=I/2 (d=2) gives 0.432 instead of log(2)=0.693. The correct formula (FR) has TWO terms: D=integral_1^infty [E_gamma(rho||sigma)/gamma + E_gamma(sigma||rho)/gamma^2] dgamma. The corrected FR-bip is: D(rho||tau) = integral_{1/d_A}^infty E_beta(rho||tau)/beta dbeta + integral_{d_A}^infty E_beta(tau||rho)/beta^2 dbeta - log(d_A). See v4 skeleton 0.6-0.7 and Liu-Hirche-Cheng arXiv:2507.07065v2.
